article: human rights activists and western diplomats are increasingly concerned about the welfare of fathi al-jahmi , a leading libyan dissident awaiting a possible death sentence while being held in solitary confinement in libya , and who is known to have several life-threatening health conditions for which he is receiving little or no medical care .
